job.title: Computer Vision Algorithm Engineer
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brThe computer vision algorithm engineer will work in a small and dynamic team to design and implement cutting edge computer vision algorithms for Apple productsbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brSolid fundamental Computer Vision methods and conceptsbrbrExperience on computer vision shipping product developmentbrbrSolid CC development skillsbrbrExperienceknowledge in 3D graphics modeling preferredbrbrExperienceknowledge in large scale Machine Learning and Pattern Recognition preferredbrbrExperienceknowledge in software development on embedded platform preferredbrbrTeam playerbrbrPassion on cutting edge computer visionmachine learning technologies and product deliverybrbrSelf motivatedbrbrExcellent problem solving skillsbrbrExcellent communication skillsbrbrCan work under stress and uncertaintybrbrFast learnerbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brVideo engineering group is looking for a computer vision algorithm engineer In this position you will work together with similar minds in a unique development team where your skills and expertise will be put into the Apple productsbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brPhD in Computer Vision or similar alternatively a comparable industry career with significant experience in stateoftheart Computer Vision Machine Learning and Pattern Recognition fieldsbrbr brRole Number 200171077brbr
